definition: lit. to bring a bramble and ask for punishment (idiom)/fig. to offer sb a humble apology
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
chaste tree or berry (Vitex agnus-castus)/alternative name for the Zhou Dynasty state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
guilt/crime/fault/blame/sin

sentences.english: Can also personally go to friend home" to offer a humble apology".
sentences.chinese: 也可以親自去朋友家“負荊請罪”。

definition: variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to withdraw/to hole up
protective coloration/camouflage
to whisper to one another's ear
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
needlework/sewing
to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping/unctuous fawning
as if dumb/speechless
overbearing/arrogant bully
flying squirrel/(dialect) bat
overjoyed (idiom); as pleased as punch
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
